body.name: GuruNanda Coconut & Peppermint Oil Pulling (8 Fl.Oz) with Tongue Scraper - Alcohol Free Mouthwash for Fresh Breath, White Teeth & Healthy Teeth & Gums
features: GuruNanda Whitening Pulling Oil (1-Pack) is a natural, Ayurvedic, holistic mouthwash that comes in a 8 fl oz bottle with a tongue scraper inside the box. It promotes fresh breath & a clean mouth.
This mouth rinse features an alcohol-free formula, a unique blend of 100% pure and natural ingredients: MCT Coconut Oil and Peppermint Essential Oil, remaining true to the ancient Ayurvedic recipe.
Swishing GuruNanda Coconut & Mint Pulling Oil helps increase saliva production, promotes plaque removal and supports healthy teeth & gums, to provide a cleaner mouth, brighter smile & fresher breath.
Pour 10-15ml of oil pulling, swish for 2 minutes, & gradually increase to 10 minutes. Discard the oil into trash to avoid clogging pipes. Pull on an empty stomach every morning for optimal results.

GuruNanda Pulling Oil is proudly made in the USA, with international & domestic ingredients & is free from fluoride, preservatives, or any artificial flavors. It is safe for use by adults and children (ages 12 & under supervision is required).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Does it come with a Tongue scraper? Absolutely! Inside every package, you'll find a spoon-shaped tongue scraper included. What gives it a rich, and smooth sensation in your mouth? All of our oil pulling formulae contain coconut as their base ingredient, which brings that rich and unadulterated goodness to every drop. How does it help with overall oral health? You can now revolutionize your oral care with our MCT coconut oil-based oil pulling. Packed with Lauric acid, a natural powerhouse, it helps inhibit the growth of harmful agents in the mouth, giving you a healthier, happier smile. What precautions should be taken while using this product? For best results, remember not to swish for more than 10 minutes at a time. Do not use if you have exposed nerve roots, as it may lead to irritation. Please ensure adult supervision for children under 12 years of age when using our product. Why should you choose us? We are a brand rooted in Ayurvedic principles, committed to crafting all our products with 100% natural ingredients, ensuring that they are completely free of harmful chemicals and toxins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Miracle Oral Care with GuruNanda Oil Pulling
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the GuruNanda Oil Pulling mouthwash, and I must say it has become a staple in my oral care routine. The 8 Fl.Oz bottle comes with a delightful combination of Coconut and Peppermint Oil, providing a natural and refreshing experience.One of the standout features is the inclusion of a tongue scraper inside the box. This thoughtful addition enhances the overall oral care routine, ensuring a comprehensive cleaning process. The tongue scraper is easy to use and adds an extra layer of cleanliness to promote overall oral health.The formula is alcohol-free, which is a big plus for me. Traditional mouthwashes with alcohol can often be harsh and drying, but GuruNanda has managed to create an effective solution without compromising on comfort. The oil pulling method is known for its ability to help with fresh breath, teeth whitening, and promoting healthier teeth and gums.The coconut and peppermint oil blend not only leaves my mouth feeling clean but also imparts a pleasant taste that lingers for a while. It's a refreshing change from the strong and artificial flavors found in some other mouthwashes.I've noticed a positive impact on my oral health since incorporating GuruNanda Oil Pulling into my routine. My breath feels fresher for longer, and I've observed a subtle improvement in teeth whiteness. Additionally, my gums seem healthier, which is a great sign of the product's effectiveness.Overall, GuruNanda Oil Pulling is a fantastic addition to anyone's oral care routine. It's natural, alcohol-free, and comes with the added bonus of a tongue scraper for a more thorough clean. If you're looking for a mouthwash that promotes fresh breath, teeth whitening, and healthier teeth and gums, give GuruNanda Oil Pulling a try – you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love incorporating this into my routine
reviews.reviewText: Guru Nanda's Coconut and Mint Pulling Oil is a game-changer in my oral care routine! I cannot emphasize enough how effective and refreshing this product is.As someone who's always conscious about oral hygiene, I was thrilled to discover this gem. Not only does it leave my mouth feeling incredibly fresh, but it's a powerhouse against bad breath and gum disease. The blend of coconut and mint creates a delightful taste and sensation, making the entire oil-pulling experience pleasant and invigorating.I've noticed a significant improvement in my gum health since incorporating this into my daily routine. Any signs of irritation have diminished, and my breath feels consistently fresher throughout the day. It's a relief to have found a natural solution that works wonders without any harsh chemicals.Another fantastic aspect is its purity. Knowing that it's made from high-quality, natural ingredients gives me confidence in its effectiveness and safety. The oil consistency is just right, making it easy to swish around without any discomfort.The convenience factor is also worth mentioning. A quick swish for a few minutes daily is all it takes to reap the benefits. Plus, the packaging is user-friendly, making it easy to dispense the right amount each time.For anyone seeking a natural, effective solution for oral health issues like bad breath or gum disease, I highly recommend giving Guru Nanda's Coconut and Mint Pulling Oil a try. It's become a staple in my routine, and I can't imagine going without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Spilled inside box, all Items covered in coconut oil
reviews.reviewText: No hate for the product itself, the seal for the bottle was still intact but somehow oil spilled all over the bottle, toothbrush, floss and tongue scraper that was inside the Guru Nanda Box. I included the pictures where you can see the difference of color due to the oil spill. Luckily the other items are all individually wrapped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for gum health and sensitivity
reviews.reviewText: This is the best oil pulling oil on the market. The texture and flavor are so much more palatable than swishing with regular coconut oil. I find that even after a few days of oil pulling that my teeth and gums are much less sensitive. It may take awhile to work up to swishing for the recommended 10 mins, but even starting at 2-5 mins will give you results. Do yourself a favor and switch to using this brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love This Stuff
reviews.reviewText: This is my second set I have bought. I have been told from several people that the oil pulling works so I decided to give it a try! Loved this from the first day and I love the extras that come with it. Really makes your mouth fresh and I love the taste! I can already tell my teeth are whiter and my overall dental health is better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pull this! How could u go wrong using this? Great flavor !
reviews.reviewText: This my 2nd bottle purchased and I love it. Like many products, wish it just had a pump to dispense, however, you must shake it prior to each use. I use about 1/4 of the cap; 2x a day, once in am in shower and at night after flossing. Taste is really good, no coconut taste at all, just right amount of peppermint. I recommended this to my husband, who hasn’t gone to the dentist in the 5 years I’ve been with him, so that will be the true review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I’m not sure how I feel
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure how I feel about this product. I know it has a lot of benefits. However, it is such a weird feeling in the fact that you have to get it all out of your mouth after you’re done and spitting it out is a little difficult. I do not like the flavor even either I’ve only used it a couple times, so I’m not sure if it actually makes my teeth whiter, so I will have to do further testing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleanliness & Freshness from the start
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing and I'm a fan. Remember to shake/mix well before use because the oil smell/consistency is intense. It gets better once you start swishing (swish for 5 to 10 minutes). I did 10 minutes (you could do it). Remember to spit it out in a trash can because the oil could clog your pipes over time. My mouth, teeth, tongue, breath feel clean & amazing. I'm so glad I open a subscription to continue getting this product. Dose: 1 Tablespoon = 15 ml (use measuring cup, along with the tongue 👅scrapper, soft toothbrush🪥, & dental floss--all included). This the beginning of a healthier mouth. Try it, my friends 🧡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good oil for teethItem received with thanks

Can’t really speak to its effectiveness for cleaning or whitening as I’ve a hard time being consistent with it. The taste and texture weren’t bad, it’s hard to swish for 10-15 mins. Tongue scraper great (dont gag urself) but the extra little flossers were terrible, broke every single time, first attempt. But suppose to be added extra value, but is it really if they suck, but didn’t buy this product for those. But oil yes, if looking for a pulling oil I recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gives a nice fresh minty taste

Saw someone on tiktok recommend this brand to use to oil pull along with waterfloss.I've used coconut oil before to oil pull, but decided to try a mint flavor to see if that helped with taste.I was expecting a mild mint. It generally is, unless you accidentally swallow it, then it is extremely minty and intense. I do NOT recommend trying to gargle with it, it will make you gag and want to throw up instantly.Which is kind of frustrating because I can't push the oil too far to my back teeth or else it will hit the back of my throat and make me gag. I like being able to gargle it as well to get the anti bacterial properties all throughout my mouth/tongue.I'm definitely going to keep using it cause it feels like it's helping. But maybe using flavourless next time. If you can handle strong peppermint then this might be great for you.Everything else about this is nice and the extra tongue scraper is great. It also comes with a little measuring cup of you want a precise amount. I don't like cleaning it out so I just squirt it directly into my mouth lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2023
